q: and focused on policy, not motives or outrageous charges. For example, Mike Pence of Indiana, a Tea Party favorite, went through a point-by-point explanation of why he believes that the provisions of the act are indeed government takeover of health care. The tone in general has been measured, voices have rarely been raised, and the focus has been on two different views of the bill. To be sure, there have been some pointed comments.

and former Sen. Rick Santorum of Pennsylvania. Mike Pence said this was his first town hall since the Tucson, Ariz., shootings and he always consults with local law enforcement on security at such events. To me the focus is and should remain on public safety. We volunteer for these Steve Jobs , but just because someone comes to a town hall meeting, they should never have to be concerned that there's not a reasonable amount of security, he said. He said town hall meetings are " very routine " for him and said he was grateful that everyone came out Monday in the wake of the Tucson shootings. Full Story CNN
